title: Stir fry lime and coconut chicken
description: This meal, if served as four portions, provides 420kcal,	25g protein, 58g carbohydrate (of which 2g sugars), 9g fat (of which 3.5g saturates), 3.5g fibre and 1.1g salt per portion.
ingredients: 2 free-range chicken breasts, cut into bite-sized pieces
1 green pepper, seeds removed, cut into strips
4 tbsp roughly chopped fresh coriander leaves
